---
description: 'Learn how to request funds from the faucet to an account output.'

  - wallet
  - send funds
  - account output

import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';

# Send Funds From an Account Ouput

## Example Code

<Tabs groupId="language" queryString>
<TabItem value="rust" label="Rust">

1. Define the [`SyncOptions`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/struct.SyncOptions.html)
    to fetch [`BasicOutputs`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/types/block/output/basic/struct.BasicOutput.html)
    for [`AccountOutputs`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/types/block/output/account/struct.AccountOutput.html)
    by setting the `basic_outputs` field to `true` in the [`AccountSyncOptions`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/struct.AccountSyncOptions.html).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/account_output/send_amount.rs#L25-L31
```

</div>

2. Instantiate a [Wallet](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html) and [sync it](../wallet/check-balance.mdx).
3. Retrieve the first [`AccountId`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/types/block/output/account/struct.AccountId.html) from the
[`Balance`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/types/struct.Balance.html) by calling
the [`Balance.accounts()`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/types/struct.Balance.html#method.accounts) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/account_output/send_amount.rs#L47
```

</div>

4. Get the [`AccountAddress`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/types/block/address/struct.AccountAddress.html)
    for the `AccountId` that was retrieved in step 3, and transform it to Bech32 using the
    [`AccountAddress.toBech32()`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/types/block/address/account/struct.AccountAddress.html#method.to_bech32)
    function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/account_output/send_amount.rs#L51
```

</div>

5. Define the [Transaction inputs](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/types/block/payload/signed_transaction/struct.Transaction.html#structfield.inputs)
    as the first `Output` that can be unlocked by the `AccountAddress`.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/account_output/send_amount.rs#L54-L62
```

</div>

6. Use the [`Wallet.send()`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html#method.send)
    function passing the inputs defined in step 4 in the  [`TransactionOptions`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/struct.TransactionOptions.html).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/account_output/send_amount.rs#L64-L73
```

</div>

7. Await for the transaction to be accepted by the network by calling the [`Wallet.wait_for_transaction_acceptance()`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html#method.wait_for_transaction_acceptance) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/account_output/send_amount.rs#L74-L76
```

</div>
</TabItem>
<TabItem value="typescript-node" label="Typescript (Node.js)">

1. Define the [`SyncOptions`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/interfaces/SyncOptions/)
    to fetch [`BasicOutputs`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/BasicOutput/)
    for [`AccountOutputs`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/AccountOutput/)
    by setting the `basic_outputs` field to `true` in the [`AccountSyncOptions`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/interfaces/AccountSyncOptions/).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/account_output/send-amount.ts#L28-L32
```

</div>

2. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/Wallet) and [sync it](../wallet/check-balance.mdx).
3. Retrieve the first [`AccountOutput`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/AccountOutput/) from the
    [`Balance`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/interfaces/Balance/) by accessing
    the [`Balance.accounts](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/interfaces/Balance/#accounts) property.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/account_output/send-amount.ts#L49
```

</div>

4. Get the [`AccountAddress`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/AccountAddress/)
for the `AccountId` that was retrieved in step 2, and transform it to Bech32 using the
[`Utils.accountIdToBech32()`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/Utils/#accountidtobech32)
function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/account_output/send-amount.ts#L55-L58
```

</div>

5. Define the [Transaction inputs](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/Transaction/#inputs)
    as the first `Output` that can be unlocked by the `AccountAddress`.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/account_output/send-amount.ts#L61-L64
```

</div>

6. Use the [`Wallet.sendWithParams()`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/Wallet/#sendwithparams)
    function passing the inputs defined in step 5 in the [`TransactionOptions`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/interfaces/TransactionOptions/).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/account_output/send-amount.ts#L66-L77
```

</div>

7. Await for the [`Transaction`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Transaction.md) to get confirmed by calling the
    [`Wallet.waitForTransactionAcceptance()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Wallet.md#waitfortransactionacceptance)
    function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/account_output/send-amount.ts#L78
```

</div>
</TabItem>
<TabItem value="python" label="Python">


1. Define the [`SyncOptions`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/sync_options/#syncoptions-objects)
to fetch [`BasicOutputs`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/types/output/#basicoutput-objects)
for [`AccountOutputs`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/AccountOutput/)
by setting the `basic_outputs` field to `true` in the [`WalletSyncOptions`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/sync_options/#walletsyncoptions-objects).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/account_output/send_amount.py#L18
```

</div>

2. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/) and [sync it](../wallet/check-balance.mdx).
3. Retrieve the first [`AccountOutput`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/types/output/#accountoutput-objects) from the
    [`Balance`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/types/balance/) by accessing
    the [`Balance.accounts](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/types/balance/#balance-objects) attribute.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/account_output/send_amount.py#L25
```

</div>

4. Get the [`AccountAddress`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/types/address/#accountaddress-objects)
    for the `AccountId` that was retrieved in step 3, and transform it to Bech32 using the
    [`Utils.account_id_to_bech32()`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/utils/#account_id_to_bech32)
    function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/account_output/send_amount.py#L29-L30
```

</div>

5. Define the [Transaction inputs](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/types/input/)
as the first `Output` that can be unlocked by the `AccountAddress`.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/account_output/send_amount.py#L33-L35
```

</div>

6. Use the [`Wallet.send_with_params()`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/#send_with_params)
function passing the inputs defined in step 5 in the [`TransactionOptions`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/types/transaction_options/).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/account_output/send_amount.py#L37-L44
```

</div>

7. Await for the transaction to get accepted by calling the [`Wallet.wait_for_transaction_acceptance()`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/wallet.md#wait_for_transaction_acceptance)
    function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/account_output/send_amount.py#L45-L46
```

</div>
</TabItem>
</Tabs>
